Package edu.purdue.bbc.util

Interface Summary
DaemonListener An interface for listening to calls from UpdateDaemon
Pair<T> Interface for a class containing a pair of Objects of the same type.
 

Class Summary
BareBonesBrowserLaunch Bare Bones Browser Launch for Java
Utility class to open a web page from a Swing application in the user's default browser.
Supports: Mac OS X, GNU/Linux, Unix, Windows XP/Vista/7
Example Usage:
    String url = "http://www.google.com/";
    BareBonesBrowserLaunch.openURL(url);
 Latest Version: www.centerkey.com/java/browser
Author: Dem Pilafian
Public Domain Software -- Free to Use as You Like
CurveFitting A class for curve fitting calculations.
Language This class is intended to allow your application to support multiple language options.
MutableNumber Creates a Number whose value can be changed.
NumberList A class for storing primitive wrappers in a List that can easily be converted to an array of the primitive counterparts
PolarPoint2D A Class for extending Point2D to include Polar Coordinates.
ProcessUtils  
Range A class for finding whether a particular value falls within a Range.
Settings  
SimplePair<T> A Class containing a pair of Objects of the same type.
SparseMatrix<T> A class for holding data in a sparse 2D array
Statistics A class for various statistical calculations.
StringUtils A class for String operations.
UpdateDaemon This class will create a background thread which will process update events in the background at minimum priority by default.
UpdateDaemon.DaemonRunnable Runnable class for the Thread.
